page.title: 04THE M.E.E. CLUB
page.content: The M.E.E. Club is for the young people of 3 churches, St Mawgan, St Eval and St Ervan hence the name.It started 4 years ago by the Rev. M.Peters, Mrs.Blizard and Mrs.Surridge It meets from 7.30 to 9.30pm on Sunday evenings. In the Summer there are out door activities such as swimming, tennis and barbecues.In the Winter it is held at The Rectory or at Mrs Blizards house where they play games, have parties or hear guest speakers from organisations such as the NSPCC. The group have spent 2 adventure weekends at a Christian Youth Hostel on the Lizard and in 1984 went on an exchange visit with a group of young people from Germany visiting such places as Hamburg and Berlin.The Germans will visit St Mawgan in October 1985.
